io.dvlopt.linux.gpio

Class GpioEventRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.dvlopt.linux.gpio.GpioEventRequest

  • public class GpioEventRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a request for obtaining a GPIO event handle for reading a line and getting interrupts.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GpioEventRequest()
      Basic constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getConsumer()
      Retrieves the consumer this line will be request under.
      int getLine()
      Retrieves which line will be requested (0 by default).
      GpioEventRequest setActiveLow(boolean isActiveLow)
      Specifies the requested line will be active low, reversing high and low.
      GpioEventRequest setConsumer(java.lang.String consumer)
      Sets the consumer this line will be request under.
      GpioEventRequest setEventMode(GpioEventMode mode)
      Selects edge-detection.
      GpioEventRequest setLine(int line)
      Sets which line will be requested.
